name: Think Company
description:
Think Company is an award-winning experience design firm founded in 2007, employing consultants across three studios with expertise in almost every industry. We pride ourselves on using a research-driven methodology which ensures our design decisions are always based on evidence. We specialize in research, strategy and visioning, content strategy, full experience and service design, digital product design, and software development.
We exist to help you create great experiences for your customers and employees. Come think with us!
